* get carrier name for a flight


```{r}
airports
```
```{r}
flts <-
flights |>
  select(year, time_hour, origin, dest, tailnum, carrier)

flts |>
  left_join(airports |>
    select(faa, lat, lon, name),
    join_by(origin == faa))
```
